mapper.select: select d.diary_code, m.id,m.name, d.diary_content, d.diary_title, d.diary_start_date, d.diary_end_date, d.img_gro_code, i.img_path from diary d, member m , image i where d.id = m.id and d.img_gro_code = i.img_gro_code ORDER by d.diary_code desc
select * from diary d join image i on d.img_gro_code = i.img_gro_code where d.diary_code = #{diaryCode}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(DIARY_CODE),0) + 1 FROM DIARY
INSERT INTO DIARY VALUES (#{diaryCode},#{id},#{diaryTitle},#{diaryStartDate},#{diaryEndDate},#{diaryContent},#{imgGroCode})

SELECT NVL(MAX(IMG_CODE),0)+1 FROM IMAGE
INSERT INTO IMAGE (IMG_CODE,IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH, IMG_GRO_CODE) VALUES (#{imgCode},#{imgName},#{imgPath}, #{imgGroCode})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DIARY WHERE DIARY_CODE = #{diaryCode} AND id = #{id}
